text: The gods granted Pandora many gifts,
and one abominable box.

Curiosity got the better of her and
chaos was unleashed upon the world.
But that's only the beginning of the story...

What if instead of accepting
the new world order,
Pandora tried to fix it?

Pandora’s Legacy is a jigsaw unlike 
any you’ve experienced before.

You’ll start by assembling the pieces 
and find areas missing.

To unlock the next section
and advance the story,

you’ll need to solve puzzles 
embedded within the jigsaw.

The puzzles, crafted by
renowned constructors,
are deep and challenging.

Some will reward you 
with physical artifacts,

that you'll then you’ll then figure 
out how to use

in ways that will surprise
and delight you—
just like in an escape room.
1,200 plus pieces to assemble.
17 boxes to unlock.
16 devious puzzles to solve.
1 infernal box.

Turn your living room 
into an escape room;
let loose the curiosities inside.

This epic experience is available
on Kickstarter now!
Do you dare open Pandora's Box?
